name: sapiently
content:

in a way that is intelligent, or shows an ability to think: The dog looked at them and then nodded his head sapiently, as if he understood. She often expressed herself so sapiently that we were amazed. Synonym
intelligently
in a way that is wise, or that shows good judgment: She sapiently kept the secret to herself. As you sapiently observe, it was all a great surprise to us. Synonym
wisely
